item.description:
Please provide your input for a Preppers' Survivalist Skills Database. Please join our companion Yahoo group which includes some databases for worldwide usage, as well as many different types of folders containing lists of resources in the files section. 

Click below to join this group now and make an entry in the existing data bases already there.

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/HolisticPreppers

You can view these databases and files by clicking on the appropriate topic in left margin there.  The database facility provided by Yahoo is very simple, allowing only 10 columns.  It would be better to have an off-line database with much more detail.

Group organizer can't do all this single-handedly, so please attend this meeting and offer your suggestions and how you would be willing to contribute to this project.

In the past some attendees have expected a formal presentation at these Meetups, but that is not the agenda at the Celery Stick Cafe meetups.  The purpose of our Concord Meetups is for members to get to know each other and share their ideas.  

This is expected even though a specific topic for concentration gets announced for that date.

If we can organize into research committees we would accomplish much more.

Please consider getting involved and making a contribution, okay?  Read on for reasons why it is time to prepare...

Extremely challenging times will soon be upon us, due to several situations which have reached a critical threshold. 

Below is a link where you can download an incredible multi-dimensional journey that will prepare you in ways we can discuss later.

Get comfy, since it takes around an hour.  Just keep in  mind that your "wing spot" is on your back, midway between chakra 4 and 5 and that your Mission Sphere is all around you. Also "Aurora Shield" is a disk of glittering helio light that seperates the Northern and Southern hemispheres of a better version of earth, where your 13th chakra is connected (straight down your central vertical tube.)

http://al-hum-bhra.com/Aug2012/

To better understand why our very survival depends upon personal preparedness steps we  take now, please view the following links:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eidQTDjQ5gw   (Crash Course - The Three E's)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nI-BIVWlc7A    (Resources & Monetary Systems)

http://projectcamelotproductions.com/interviews/ashayana_deane/ashayana_deane.html(2012 Cosmic Energy Changes)

Details about each monthly topic will be added a month before the Meetup date. Please feel free to make suggestions for future topics. 

The quickest way to contact the group organizer is by sending an e-mail to info@ulcsclinic.com with "Meetup Member" in subj. line. If subject contains something else, message may get deleted unread due to filters and spam controls.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Meetup sign on one of the tables. If place is crowded look for Aalia holding up a Meetup sign right inside doorway. In that case we will go to another place nearby to eat and talk.

group.name: Back to Basics: Sustainable Self-Sufficient Healthy Living

item.name: Preppers' Survivalist Skills Data Base
